titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation that the moneys lately called in, may nevertheless be currant in all payments to, or for the use of, His Majesty until the first day of May next
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the seventh day of December, in the thirteenth year of our reign, 1661."
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
